description: '''Lorenzo Antonio''' (born '''Lorenzo Antonio SÃ¡nchez Pohl''' October 3, 1969, in [[Albuquerque]], [[New Mexico]], [[United States]]), is an American [[Latin music]] singer-songwriter, who is known and recognized in [[Mexico]], the United States, and [[Latin America]]. He was raised in both Mexico and in the United States, and is fluent in both Spanish and English. Most of his songs are in Spanish, but he has released songs in English as well.
